coreAttributes.authorTag: A tag discreetly sewn into the veil's inner lining informs you that it was made by 'SectoniaServant'.
coreAttributes.name: Gerudo veil
coreAttributes.description: A veil and hood that seems to come from a special race called the Gerudo. It's meant for vai. It's designed to provide protection against the desert heat.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your veil and hood.
displacementText.playerNPC: You pull off [npc.name]'s veil and hood.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab [npc.name]'s veil and hood and roughly pulls it off [npc.her] head.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] pulls your veil and hood off.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your veil and hood and roughly pulls it off your head.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s veil and hood and roughly pulls it off [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull on the veil and hood.
replacementText.playerNPC: You guide [npc.name]'s head into the veil and hood.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the veil and hood onto [npc.her] head.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls on the veil and hood.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] guides your head into the veil and hood.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly forces the veil and hood onto your head.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] guides [npc2.name]'s head onto the veil and hood.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly forces the veil and hood onto [npc2.her] head.

displacementText.playerSelf: You pull your veil down to just below your chin.
displacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] veil down to just below [npc.her] chin.

replacementText.playerSelf: You pull your veil back up, covering your mouth.
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] pulls [npc.her] veil back up to cover [npc.her] mouth.
